Representative_Docs: ['risk of misleading results this risk refers to the principle of the cepej charter namely principle of respect for fundamental rights with to the judges independence in their process', 'risk of grounds for the judgment this risk refers to the principle of the cepej charter namely principle of respect for fundamental rights with to the right of access to the judge and the right to fair trial', 'the cepej charter lays out five key principles that should be respected in the design and use of artificial intelligence by the judiciary principle of respect for fundamental rights ensuring that the design and implementation of tools and services are compatible with fundamental rights principle of specifically preventing the development or intensification of any discrimination between individuals or groups of individuals principle of quality and security with to the processing of judicial decisions and data using certified sources and intangible data with models elaborated in disciplinary manner in secure technological environment principle of transparency impartiality and fairness making data processing methods accessible and understandable authorising external audits under user control principle precluding prescriptive approach and ensuring that users are informed actors and in control of the choices made']
